@JoeGarlick pixel is faster than SE. Apple eco system is better (own headphones). Android is great, apps aren't as good as iOS in general.
@JoeGarlick got a mate to bring one back from Sydney. It's a great phone. Still not as good end to end experience like iPhone. Very close.
The Pixel needs good headphones now. Apple ear buds play/pause work, but not answering calls or volume up/down. Samsung headphones are sucky
@nicktmro I'd say they will add touch functionality eventually.
@nicktmro Using siri to adjust volume is going to be tricky in a lot of situations, especially for people without a watch.
@nicktmro The apple ear buds work (no volume, only play/pause). So like the airpods you'll have to volume up on the phone.
